segments.text: I am quite astonished by the womanâ€™s absolute focus.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands there, diligently drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the sink beside her is actively flooding the kitchen floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A large puddle has already formed, with her foot submerged.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is perfectly neutral, betraying no hint of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost comical how oblivious she is to her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are also causing a ruckus behind her, stealing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, she remains in her own little world of dish care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dedication to this mundane task is, in a way, admirable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What an incredible ability to concentrate under such circumstances.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Perhaps she has achieved a level of zen that I can only dream of.
segments.speaker: PAR
